name: A Tiger's Tale
description:
Rupert the tiger wakes up one morning and wonders where his big brother Roger has gone. He starts becoming very anxious and worried, and takes it upon himself to go and find him within the forest.

Rupert, venturing through the forest to try and find his brother, comes across many different animals that have their own “issue” they need help to conquer. In helping these other animals, Rupert learns to accept that it is OK to ask others for help and learns to accept himself.
